name: laquiniela247-standalone
description: La Quiniela 247 Standalone Website - Migrated from WordPress

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.migrate:db: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.seed:db: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run migrate:db && npm run seed:db

author: La Quiniela 247
